meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intricate.
meanings.sent1: The intricacy of the puzzle amazed me.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting displayed a high level of intricacy.
meanings.sent3: The intricacy of the plot in the movie kept me guessing until the end.
meanings.sent4: The intricacy of the spider's web was a marvel of nature's design.
meanings.sent5: The intricacy of the watch mechanism was fascinating to observe.

meanings.definition: Something intricate or complex in design or structure.
meanings.sent1: The jewelry box was a beautiful example of intricacy.
meanings.sent2: The ancient manuscript was filled with intricate intricacy.
meanings.sent3: The intricacy of the cake decoration was almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The intricacy of the model ship's rigging was a challenge to assemble.
meanings.sent5: The intricacy of the snowflake's pattern was mesmerizing to behold.
